name: Liminal (itch) (Electric Cat)
description:
In this short horror game you are stuck in the backrooms with no memory of who you are and where you came from. Try to find the exit at the end of this maze, and avoid the dangers lurking about.

This game is in beta. There is no sound yet and no story, but more features are coming very soon.

Controls:

-WASD to move;

-Mouse to look;

-Shift to run;

Space to jump;

` to open the cheat menu;
